Title: Captain Latvia
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Matt Lawton, Phil Augusta Jackson (executive story editor), Tricia McAlpin (executive story editor), David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (executive story editor), Carly Hallam (story editor), Alexis Wilkinson (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Jake and Charles face off against a Latvian criminal ring when Jake helps Charles find his son's favorite toy for Christmas.
